page.title: 09SHOPPING AT SAVACENTRE
page.content: Savacentre is a large hypermarket in Oldbury. It sells thousands of different items and is usually very crowded. Savacentre has 11 aisles and 32 check-out points. Each check-out has a conveyor belt where items pass the check-out person. The price of each item is then entered into a till and you are given a receipt for the things you have bought. The hypermarket has a very large car park for its' customers and even sells its' own petrol. People come from a very large area to shop at Savacentre because it sells so many different things and often the prices are a little cheaper than in other shops. Savacentre is very close to the motorway which also helps customers reach it more easily.
